listitem.para: A predicate that outputs TRUE if there are more characters to read from the read stream. If the read stream is a file, then KEYP is equivalent to NOT EOFP. If the read stream is set to the Commander, then KEYP always outputs TRUE.
KEYP is provided for compatibility with other &GENERICNAME; environments. The traditional semantics of KEYP are not appropriate to &PRODUCTNAME;'s graphical environment.
